snippet: With images of boys learning to cook in the 1930s or girls fencing in 1891, an exhibition at the George Eastman House in Rochester examines depictions of gender since the 19th century.
abstract: With images of boys learning to cook in the 1930s or girls fencing in 1891, an exhibition at the George Eastman House in Rochester examines depictions of gender since the 19th century.

headline.main: Examining Identity, Gender Image by Gender Image
